inclusion.criterion: Subjects' guardians are able to understand and sign the informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subjects who can and will comply with the requirements of the protocol
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Subjects with temperature ≤37.0°C on axillary setting
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Subject that has a medical history of any of the following: allergic history, or allergic to any ingredient of vaccine
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Have serious side effects to vaccine, such as allergies, hives, breathing difficulties, angioneurotic oedema or abdominal pain
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Asthma, in the past two years, unsteady and require emergency treatment, hospitalization, intubation, oral administration or intravenous corticosteroids
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Diabetes (type I or II), not including gestational diabetes
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Serious angioneurotic edema in the past three years, or in need of treatment in the past 2 years
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has V. cholerae infection and is experiencing severe diarrhea, which may be a contraindication for vaccination.
